name: KHRAF LANDS
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

Khraf Lands is a solo-player bullet hell where you can build your own weapons while defeating the Haperian evil robots. Survive and find your way home.

CONTROLS:

[W, A, S, D] - Move

[MOUSE] - Aim/Shoot

This is an unfinished project and all your feedback can be left in the comments.

Thank you for playing!
